quotes.quote: You know what they say, information is not power. Wait.
Who needs actual doctors when you've got the internet?
Being drunk doesn't change who you are, it just reveals it.
Who needs med school when you've got Wi-Fi?
Work smart, not hard.
I have no idea what you meant, but I could smell what The Rock was cooking
Phew! For a moment there, I thought you were smart.
The most successful marriages are based on lies.
Everybody lies.
Gorgeous women do not go to medical school... unless, they're as damaged as they are beautiful.
Because I'm a doctor. Because when we make mistakes people die.
Truth begins in lies.
Oxygen is so important during those prepubescent years, don't you think?
No, treating illnesses is why we became doctors. Treating patients is what makes most doctors miserable.
Thirty percent of all dads out there don't realize they're raising someone else's kid.
Perseverance does not equal worthiness.
Another reason I don't like meeting patients - they don't know what you look like, they can't yell at you.
If I eat standing up, I spill.
Men should grow up.
Men are lucky they can only have one orgasm.
Don't worry. Many women learn to embrace this parasite. They name it, dress it up in tiny clothes, arrange playdates with other parasites.
It's easier to die than to watch someone die.
Candy canes? Are you mocking me?
What I have difficulty with is the whole concept of belief. Faith isn't based on logic and experience.
Can't hate someone if you don't know them
You know how it is with nuns, you take out their IUDs, they just bounce right back.
She has God inside of her. Would have been easier to deal with a tumor.
I don't know who I am anymore.
Self-sacrifice is not a symptom of schizophrenia. It excludes the diagnosis.
Well, as long as you're trying to be good, you can do whatever you want.
Is a lie a lie if everybody knows it's a lie?
I didn't realize it was possible for a woman to be "unusually" irritable.
I don't ask why patients lie. I just assume they all do.
It's what I do.
I'm the doctor who's trying to save your son, you're the mom who's letting him die. Clarification - it's a beautiful thing
What can I say? Chicks with no teeth turn me on.
I hate sports metaphors.
Maternal instinct is always irrational. Doesn't mean it's wrong.
What do teenage boys do in the morning besides... the obvious?
Hey. I'm a man. I don't have time for laundry. I'm savin' lives here.
Like I always say, there's no "I" in team. There's a "me" though, if you jumble it up.
You know, some doctors have the Messiah complex. They need to save the world. You've got the Rubik's complex. You need to solve the puzzle.
When I hired you, I knew you were insane.
Trying to convince an insane person not to do insane things is, in itself, insane.
You can think I'm wrong, but that's no reason to stop thinking.
My staff are idiots. I'm sure you know what it's like, Your Honor.
Patients sometimes get better. You have no idea why, but unless you give a reason, they won't pay you.
So your philosophy is, if they don't want treatment, they get it shoved down their throat, but if it might cure their paralysis, whoa, better slow down.
You make enough calls, one of 'em is bound to be right.
Patients lie but usually only one lie at a time.
Fake low blood sugar - now THAT'S acting!
I take risks, sometimes patients die, but not taking risks causes more patients to die - so I guess my biggest problem is I've been cursed with the ability to do the math.
Hi. I'm Dr. House, and this is the coolest day of my life!
He needs a new kidney. I was thinking the kidney people might have some.
Never visit a patient.
A secret club? What's the secret? They're all morons?
The little ones call me "Uncle Greg."
Of course I'm self interested. We all are, we're born that way.
There you are. Were you scared? It's okay. You're home now.
I'm pretty sure my X-Ray machine can take your phone in a fight. It'll fry it.
Do you ever watch "Gilligan's Island" reruns and really, really think they're going to get off the island this time?
Read less, more TV.
Who da man? I da man.
Billionaires buy movie studios to get laid. They buy hospitals to get respect.
That's House. He knows things.
Well, this is not a team. It's not a boat. It's not a machine that has a lot of parts that have to work together. The metaphors are all crap. This is a business - that's all it is.
Sorry, you don't get to make that call unless you have a stethoscope. Union rules.
It takes decades to eat your way into a heart attack.
If I was that fat, I'd be pretty tempted to knock back a bottle of pills.

Some day there will be a black president. Some day there will be a gay president. Maybe there will even be a gay, black president. But one combination I do not see happening is gay, black, and dead. You need to stop lying to me.
You're the most naive atheist I've ever met.
Now I'm not a baby expert, but I'm pretty sure they're not supposed to shrink.
I don't like loud, angry giants threatening me with violence. How is that pathetic?
Gregory House is a symbol of everything wrong with the healthcare industry.
You are a great doctor, House, but you are not worth $100 million.
A man is a sum of his actions.
